biotools.summary: TaxiBGC (Taxonomy-guided Identification of Biosynthetic Gene Clusters): A computational strategy for identifying experimentally verified Biosynthetic Gene Clusters (BGCs) and inferring their annotated secondary metabolites (SMs) from metagenomic shotgun sequencing data.

bioschemas.name: TaxiBGC
bioschemas.summary: TaxiBGC (Taxonomy-guided Identification of Biosynthetic Gene Clusters): A computational strategy for identifying experimentally verified Biosynthetic Gene Clusters (BGCs) and inferring their annotated secondary metabolites (SMs) from metagenomic shotgun sequencing data.
